original_text: But when the Syrians saw that they had been defeated by Israel, they sent messengers and brought out the Syrians who were beyond the Euphrates, with Shophach the commander of the army of Hadadezer at their head.
korean_text: 아람 사람이 자기가 이스라엘 앞에서 패하였음을 보고 사신을 보내 강 건너편에 있는 아람 사람을 불러내니 하닷에셀의 군대사령관 소박이 그들을 거느린지라

sentences.original_text: that they had been defeated by Israel,
with Shophach the commander of the army of Hadadezer at their head.
sentences.korean_translation: 하다데셀의 군대 지휘관인 소박을 선두로 하였다.
